ComicInfo.Title: Marinated M.I.L.F.
ComicInfo.Summary:
In another untold tale of Cathy, the girls plan a get together suburbs style and while the hubby's grill the girls are upstairs doing the real cooking! Poor Cathy. Won't she ever learn to just do as she's told? 24-page full-color comic book.
